org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades

Interface Blade

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockingBlade, CommonReactor, IsolationBlade, NonBlockingBlade, PoolThreadReactorImpl, Reactor, ReactorImpl, SwingBoundBlade, ThreadBoundBlade
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Account, BladeBase, BlockingBladeBase, BlockingReactor, BlockingReactorMtImpl, Delay, Delays, EH, Facility, HelloWorld, Isolation, IsolationBladeBase, IsolationReactor, IsolationReactorMtImpl, NonBlockingBladeBase, NonBlockingReactor, NonBlockingReactorMtImpl, Order, Parallel, PoolThreadReactorMtImpl, ReactorBase, ReactorMtImpl, Sequence, Signal, Simple, SwingBoundBladeBase, SwingBoundReactor, SwingBoundReactorMtImpl, ThreadBoundBladeBase, ThreadBoundReactor, ThreadBoundReactorMtImpl, Timeout, VerySlow, Worker

    public interface Blade

    A blade is an object with state operated on by requests within the thread context of a single reactor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Reactor getReactor()
      Returns the reactor used by the requests of this blade.

    • Method Detail

      • getReactor

        Reactor getReactor()
        Returns the reactor used by the requests of this blade.
        Returns:
        The Reactor.
